select plan.activity_id as activity_id, area.city as area
from ( select * from inno72_activity_plan plan where #{date} BETWEEN plan.start_time and plan.end_time and is_delete = 0 ) as plan LEFT join inno72_activity_plan_machine on inno72_activity_plan_machine.activity_plan_id = plan.id
left join inno72_machine machine on machine.id = inno72_activity_plan_machine.machine_id
left join inno72_locale locale on locale.id = machine.locale_id
left join inno72_admin_area area on area.`code` = locale.area_code
select * from inno72_merchant_total_count where activity_id = #{activityId} and machant_id = #{merchantId}
select count(*) from inno72_activity_plan where activity_id = #{activityId} and #{subDate} between start_time and end_time

select count(machine.id) from inno72_activity_plan plan left join inno72_activity_plan_machine l on plan.id = l.activity_plan_id left join inno72_machine machine on machine.id = l.machine_id where plan.activity_id = #{activityId}
select * from (select * from inno72_merchant_total_count where merchant_id is not null and merchant_id != '' order by last_update_time desc limit 100000) a group by merchant_id, activity_id

select count(im.id) from inno72_merchant m left join inno72_merchant_user u on u.id = m.merchant_account_id left join inno72_interact_merchant im on im.merchant_id = m.id where u.merchant_id = #{merchantId} and im.interact_id = #{activityId};

select count(im.machine_id) from ( select g.id as goodsId from inno72_merchant m left join inno72_merchant_user u on u.id = m.merchant_account_id left join inno72_goods g on g.seller_id = m.merchant_code where u.merchant_id = #{merchantId}) goods inner join inno72_interact_machine_goods ig on ig.goods_id = goodsId inner join inno72_interact_machine im on im.id = ig.interact_machine_id where im.interact_id = #{activityId}
select merchant_id from inno72_merchant_user u left join inno72_merchant t on t.merchant_account_id = u.id where t.merchant_code = #{sellerId} limit 1
